00019 
00020 #ifndef __surfit__solvers__
00021 #define __surfit__solvers__
00022 
00023 #define SOLVER_CG              0
00024 #define SOLVER_CG2                 1
00025 #define SOLVER_SIMPITER    2
00026 #define SOLVER_SIMPITER2   3
00027 #define SOLVER_SOR             4
00028 #define SOLVER_SSOR            5
00029 #define SOLVER_JACOBI      6
00030 
00031 #define SOLVER_DEFAULT  SOLVER_CG
00032 
00033 #define SOLVER_CG_MAX          40
00034 #define SOLVER_CG2_MAX         40
00035 #define SOLVER_SIMPITER_MAX   100
00036 #define SOLVER_SIMPITER2_MAX  100
00037 
00038 // solvers
00039 #include "cg.h"
00040 #include "cg2.h"
00041 #include "simpiter.h"
00042 #include "simpiter2.h"
00043 #include "sor.h"
00044 #include "ssor.h"
00045 #include "jacobi.h"
00046 
00047 namespace surfit {
00048 
00049 class vec;
00050 
00055 const char * solver_name(int code);
00056 
00057 template <class Matr, class Vect>
00058 void solve(Matr * T, Vect * V, int solver_code, vec *& X) {
00059         switch (solver_code) {
00060         case SOLVER_CG:
00061                 X = cg(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_CG_MAX,tol,X,FLT_MAX);
00062                 break;
00063         case SOLVER_CG2:
00064                 X = cg2(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_CG2_MAX,tol,X);
00065                 break;
00066         case SOLVER_SIMPITER:
00067                 X = simpiter(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_SIMPITER2_MAX,tol,X);
00068                 break;
00069         case SOLVER_SIMPITER2:
00070                 X = simpiter2(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_SIMPITER2_MAX,tol,X);
00071                 break;
00072         case SOLVER_SOR:
00073                 X = sor(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_SIMPITER2_MAX,tol,X);
00074                 break;
00075         case SOLVER_SSOR:
00076                 X = ssor(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_SIMPITER2_MAX,tol,X);
00077                 break;
00078         case SOLVER_JACOBI:
00079                 X = jacobi(T,V,V->size()*SOLVER_SIMPITER2_MAX,tol,X);
00080                 break;
00081         default:
00082                 writelog(SURFIT_DEBUG, "isbsfm_bf : wrong solver_code" );
00083         }
00084 };
00085 
00086 };
00087 
00088 #endif
00089


surfit-1.0.0pre
